=APPLE OSX Installation Instructions=
==(Now with OSX native speech!)==
=Requires OSX java5 upgrade=

Download [http://carsonday.googlepages.com/DecafOSX.tar.gz DecafOSX.tar.gz]

Unstuff it and move the directory whereever you want. 

Double click on Decaf.app to execute.

The voice you have set in System Preferences is the one that is used.
